attributes.action: In family court use an evidence based system. Use proof same as criminal law.
attributes.additional_details: The unfair system currently where people falsely accuse fathers and mothers of things with no evidence. They lie and the ones who get hurt are the children.
attributes.background: Change family law to use evidence same as criminal law. Stop accusations without proof.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594115
